Room.Name: Cliff Top
Room.ShortDescription: You are on top of rocky cliffs extending westward in Lelion Beach and Park.
Room.LongDescription: The cliffs on either side run down to the beach areas to the south and the Lithium Inlet on the north. The flat part of the cliff extends to the west and east. You are much higher than the fog, but the bay is shrouded in a dense blanket of grey to the southwest. The clifftops provide a nice view of the ships in the bay, and the city to the east.
